panel2.p1: The official policy basis for Portuguese immigrants came from August 2012. Portugal, in response to the debt crisis in Europe, increased employment and contributed to the prosperity of the Portuguese economy, the Portuguese immigration authorities introduced a new draft amendment to the immigration law, one of which is an important part of the proposed new investment Immigration policy.
panel2.p2: On August 9, 2012, the Portuguese Parliament unanimously adopted the draft. According to the law, the new immigration law was formally implemented on October 8, 2012.
panel2.p3: The Portuguese Investment Immigration Program (ARI), also known as the Gold Residence Permit (GRP), entered into force on 8 October 2012, was revised again in June 2015 and September, with investment requirements of - not less than 50 in Portugal Million euros of real estate. Real estate type, the number is not limited to the purchase of civilian residential, commercial space, industrial space, agricultural space, you can buy one or more sets, just to meet the total purchase of not less than 500,000 euros eligible to apply for immigration.
panel2.p4: Real estate can buy more sets, as long as the total price of 500,000 euros can be purchased by the purchase of five years after the free sale.

p5.s: About visa: 1 year visa for the first time, 1 year after the need to renew, get 2 years residence visa, after the expiration of 2 years and then renewed 2 years (referred to as 1+2+2). The applicant must demonstrate that the minimum period of stay has been fulfilled, ie:
p5.text: The first year to be continuous or accumulated in the Portuguese residence for 7 days, after every two years to be continuous or accumulated in the Portuguese residence for 14 days. So that after 5 years to obtain a permanent residence visa, 6 years after the nationality can apply.
